html: 5.23.22  4:02 am   Monday 11.24.14 has music that feels like sitting in a living room and bantering back and forth while sunset light comes through the windows. Is there a longer version?

5.22.22  2:38 pm   Do all the harmonic extensions implied throughout your songs just materialize while improvising, or are you thinking "this needs to be a big V7b9#9 sound" and writing lines and aux keys figures to suit that?

It just feels like there's a logic to your idiosyncratic bananas harmonic sensibilities over the course of a song, and I'm curious how premeditated  it all is in your composition/recording process.
5.22.22  10:21 am   Do you ever just study quantum mechanics?

5.19.22  4:50 pm   Do you have any lyrics that were part of Fly Around but got scrapped?

     May I see some?

5.19.22  3:45 pm   I have a really hard time finishing things. I cant seem to finish any artistic project, books or even a video game! I have a desire to start/create and do, but crossing the finish line is not something I seem to achieve lately. Have you ever struggled with this?

     I think I'm afraid of the experience ending or of "ruining" it.

     I know perfectionism is holding me back. But I also don't like sub par quality. I would love your advice, you really inspired me to start creating again and just "do".
